None.Name: Explosive
None.Description: Upon being destroyed, bomb explodes dealing 560 damage to enemies in a 20m radius around its target, up to 1300 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Self-Destruct
None.Description: Activate to trigger Detonation by destroying the bomb.
